mapper.select: SELECT a.COMM_CD as commCd , a.COMM_NM as commNm FROM db_izbook.XCOMMTB a WHERE LEFT(a.COMM_CD,3) = #{paramCommCd1} AND SUBSTRING(a.COMM_CD, 4,4) != '0000'
SELECT a.CUSTS_CD as custsCd , a.CUSTS_NM as custsNm FROM MCUSTSTB a WHERE CUST_CD = #{paramCustCd } AND CUSTS_CD != '00000000' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CUSTS_NM ASC

SELECT a.AGENT_CD as agentCd , a.AGENT_NM as agentNm FROM MAGENTTB a WHERE 1=1 AND a.OUT_DAY >= #{paramCloseDay }
AND ( a.AGENT_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValueNm }, '%' ) OR a.AGENT_CD LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValueNm }, '%') )

SELECT p.PROD_CD as prodCd , p.PROD_NM as prodNm , p.AUTHOR_NM as authorNm , p.I_PRICE as iPrice , p.O_PRICE as oPrice , p.S_PRICE as sPrice , p.PUB_DAY as pubDay , p.USE_YN as useYn FROM MPRODTB p WHERE 1=1
AND p.USE_YN = #{paramAll}
AND ( p.PROD_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValueNm }, '%' ) OR p.PROD_CD LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValueNm }, '%') )
ORDER BY p.PUB_DAY DESC

SELECT count(*) as maxPages FROM MPRODTB d WHERE 1 = 1
AND d.PROD_DIV = #{paramProdDiv }
AND d.PROD_FG = #{paramProdFg }
AND d.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND d.USE_YN != 'Y'
AND ( LOWER(d.PROD_NM) LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramSearchValue }, '%' ) OR LOWER(d.PROD_CD) LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramSearchValue }, '%' ) )
ORDER BY d.MAKE_DAY DESC

SELECT a.CUST_CD as custCd , a.CUST_CD as oldCustCd , a.CUSTS_CD as custsCd , a.CUSTS_NM as custsNm , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.EXPLAINS as explains , a.REG_DATE as regDate , a.REG_ID as regId , a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate , a.UPDATE_ID as updateId , 'U' as iuD FROM MCUSTSTB as a WHERE a.CUSTS_CD = "00000000"

SELECT a.CUST_CD as custCd , a.CUSTS_CD as custsCd , a.CUSTS_CD as oldCustsCd , a.CUSTS_NM as custsNm , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.EXPLAINS as explains , a.REG_DATE as regDate , a.REG_ID as regId , a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate , a.UPDATE_ID as updateId , 'R' as iuD FROM MCUSTSTB as a WHERE a.CUST_CD = #{paramCustCd } AND a.CUSTS_CD != "00000000"

SELECT d.AGENT_CD as agentCd , d.AGENT_CD as oldAgentCd , d.AGENT_NM as agentNm , d.MAKE_DAY as makeDay , d.OUT_DAY as outDay , d.EXPLAINS as explains , d.REG_DATE as regDate , d.REG_ID as regId , d.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate , d.UPDATE_ID as updateId , 'R' as iuD
FROM MAGENTTB d WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( LOWER(d.AGENT_CD) LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValue }, '%' ) OR LOWER(d.AGENT_NM) LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{paramValue }, '%' ) )
